summary.para: Describes the attributes of a specified verb for an object.

remarks.para: Values are used in the enumerator (which supports the interface) that is created by a call to .

summary.para: Executing this verb will not cause the object to become dirty and is therefore in need of saving to persistent storage.
Indicates a verb that should appear in the container's menu of verbs for this object. OLEIVERB_HIDE, OLEIVERB_SHOW, and OLEIVERB_OPEN never have this value set.
